text:
Yeehaw! It's party time!

It's time to mosey on down to the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas for the 2018 ACM Awards.

Expect host Reba McEntire to set the tone with a few wild moments of her own, and a slew of acts and performers are set to grace the stage with showstopping performances. And with so many gorgeous celebrities to keep an eye on (Hello and Miranda Lambert!) it's won't be easy to keep up.

CMA Award nominees Lauren Alaina, , Dierks Bentley, Kane Brown,, Kenny Chesney, Florida Georgia Line, Alan Jackson, , Little Big Town, Midland, Maren Morris, Jon Pardi, Thomas Rhett, , and Brett Young will take the stage for must-see performances.

Bebe Rexha is set to make her debut appearance at the ACM Awards, performing the chart-topping collab "Meant to Be" with Florida Georgia Line.

Fans can also expect Hollywood stars , AJ Buckley, Sam Elliot, , Nancy O'Dell, and Max Thieriot. Pro athletes Drew Brees and will also be presenting some of the night's most prestigious awards.

Check out what all the stars wore down the red carpet...
title: ACM Awards 2018 Red Carpet Fashion: See Every Look as the Stars Arrive
